contact_description: Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
name: Name
subject: Subject
contact_success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon.
feedback_description: Your feedback helps us improve our products and services. Let us know what you think and how we can make JunaGO better for you.
feedback_title_placeholder: Summarize your feedback in a few words
feedback_description_placeholder: Please provide as much detail as possible
email_privacy_note: We'll only use your email to respond to your feedback
feedback_success: We appreciate your feedback. Your input helps us improve our platform for everyone.
faq_response_time: How long will it take to get a response?
faq_response_time_answer: We typically respond to feedback within 1-2 business days.
faq_feature_request_answer: All feature requests are reviewed by our product team and considered for future updates.
faq_bug_report_answer: Please include steps to reproduce, expected vs. actual behavior, and any error messages you see.
need_help_description: If you need immediate assistance, please contact our support team.
ai_recommendation_message: Great work with JavaScript! I recommend taking the ES6+ knowledge test before moving on to React Advanced. This will help you better understand modern syntax.
chatbot_greeting: Hello! I'm your JunaGO learning assistant. How can I help you today?
chatbot_error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
